QuestData.Title: Neutralizing the Nethermancers
QuestData.Description: The blood elves are fools! I'm glad that our trade relations with them have fallen apart. In all of my travels throughout the cosmos, I have never encountered beings so selfish.$B$BThey continue to destroy the land around us with their manaforges, so let's see if we can put a dent in their operations across the bridge at Manaforge Ara.$B$BTheir nethermancers channel energy to and from the blood gems to stabilize the flow of power. Go over there and wipe them out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 15 Sunfury Nethermancers and return to Nether-Stalker Oazul at Tuluman's Landing in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many nethermancers have you managed to fell?
QuestData.RewardText: Anything that we can do to encourage them to stop what they're doing at these manaforges is a good thing.$B$BThey certainly do not seem to be able to be reasoned with. And it seems clear to me that whatever their leaders have in mind, they are insane.$B$BAs remuneration for your faithful service to the goals of the Consortium, I would like to offer you the coin of your realm if it does not offend you.
